job_title: React Developer (Reactjs React.js) - Native and Web - REMOTE
job_description:
TekStream is seeking a Sr React Developer for our enterprise client. This will be a 6+ month project that is remote

We are looking for a Sr. Full Stack React Framework Developer/Architect who has experience with web components and React Native. The Developer needs to know how to build great front end apps and also how to architect front end integrations.

Requirements:

· 7-10 years of experience

· Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience.

· Experience designing for multiple devices and responsive design.

· Excellent organization, communication, interpersonal, and time management skills.

· Enthusiasm for leadership, team management, and mentorship.

· Skilled using React, Angular, JavaScript, API Integrations, SQL, UI Frameworks, Mongo DB

Jenkins, AWS, Enterprise projects, etc.

Please send resumes to chad.cohen@tekstream.com

Qualifications: Full Stack React Framework Developer/Architect who has experience with web components and React Native
The Developer needs to know how to build great front end apps and also how to architect front end integrations
7-10 years of experience
Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience
Experience designing for multiple devices and responsive design
Excellent organization, communication, interpersonal, and time management skills
Enthusiasm for leadership, team management, and mentorship
Skilled using React, Angular, JavaScript, API Integrations, SQL, UI Frameworks, Mongo DB

job_description:
Role: React Developer

Duration: 6+ months

Location: Dallas, Bentonville, Hoboken, Sunnyvale.

Overview: Looking for front end developers who have experience in building web applications using React framework that is used to build web applications. Strong developer, no specific amount of years but has worked with react the same. Contributing to health project. Patient portal for health clinic. Upcoming appointments, schedule, manage profile, edit your personal information, add insurances. Developer would be contributing to code base by developing new features and maintaining the existing functionality that they have.

Required:
• ReactJS
• React Context API / useContext (React hook)
• useReducer same concept behind Redux. Can have one or the other
• useState
• Typescript not JavaScript
• Jest and react testing library important because developers write unit and integration tests. Not doing TDD. Develop feature and then write a test after. A different library is fine.
• Experience building responsive applications
• CSS/styling

Nice to have:
• NextJS this would be a plus
• GraphQL not mandatory but nice to have
• Consume GraphQL APIs
• ADA experience making the website accessible for seeing and hearing impaired. Will have to learn this if they don't have it. Could be the deciding factor in whether a candidate gets a job.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field or equivalent combination of industry-related professional experience and education.

Qualifications: Overview: Looking for front end developers who have experience in building web applications using React framework that is used to build web applications
Strong developer, no specific amount of years but has worked with react the same
ReactJS
React Context API / use
useReducer same concept behind Redux
useState
Typescript not JavaScript
Jest and react testing library important because developers write unit and integration tests
Experience building responsive applications
GraphQL not mandatory but nice to have
Consume GraphQL APIs
ADA experience making the website accessible for seeing and hearing impaired
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field or equivalent combination of industry-related professional experience and education
Responsibilities: Contributing to health project
Upcoming appointments, schedule, manage profile, edit your personal information, add insurances
Developer would be contributing to code base by developing new features and maintaining the existing functionality that they have
Develop feature and then write a test after

job_description:
Looking to join an innovative and high growth company run by a recognized and successful team of co-founders and executives? Well, it’s an exciting time to join Curbio, a Real Estate Tech company founded in 2017 to transform the multi-billion dollar home improvement and residential real estate market. We help real estate agents and their clients get listings ready for market with smart home improvements and a fix now, pay later model. We are using technology to completely re-invent the archaic home improvement experience and make it work for real estate.

Curbio fosters a creative and supportive work environment that encourages our staff to reach and surpass their full potential. We believe that unity of goals and diversity of people is a powerful combination. We believe that personal responsibility almost always outperforms corporate policies. Our team is focused, driven and inventive.

Curbio has been recognized for exemplary leadership and company culture many times over. In 2022, Curbio made both Inc.’s Top 5000 fastest growing companies in America as well as Deloitte’s Technology Fast 500. We are certified as a Great Place to Work® and our CEO, Rick Rudman, was named a 2021 & 2022 Best CEO by Comparably, where we also received distinctions for Happiest Employees and Best Compensation. Curbio has also been recognized for its success as a tech-powered home improvement solution, receiving nods in the Qualified Remodeler Top 500 list, PropTech Breakthrough awards, Best in Biz awards and NTVC Tech 100 awards, to name a few.

We won’t bore you with our amazing benefits (they are, we got an award on those too). But if you want to work with an experienced management team that wants to create a great workplace environment, present new opportunities and challenges, provide a clear path for career growth, and work in a collaborative environment with dedicated people - this is the place for you.

Join Curbio today and help us make real estate move!

At Curbio you will:
• Serve as a frontend software developer specializing primarily in React Native, but with React web experience as well.
• Report directly to the CTO.
• Communicate – understand when it’s a technical decision vs. a product decision and socialize uncertainties.
• Pay attention to detail and refactor as you go.
• Meet with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications.
• Review application requirements and interface designs.
• Refine the CI/CD pipeline and Cloud Ops processes.

What we’re looking for:
• 5+ years of experience working with React and React Native.
• Experience working in .Net Framework or .Net Core is a plus.
• Front End: React & Material Design.
• Back End: C# .Net Core, SQL Server.
• Infrastructure: Azure & Azure Functions.
• A firm commitment to quality code.
• Experience working as a developer in an agile process with a regular sprint schedule, user stories prioritized from a backlog and sprint reviews, preferred.
• Native development experience in Swift or Objective-C for iOS, or Java for Android, a plus.

Curbio is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. As such, we are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, Veteran status or any other characteristic protected under federal, state, or applicable local law

Qualifications: 5+ years of experience working with React and React Native
Front End: React & Material Design
Back End: C# .Net Core, SQL Server
Infrastructure: Azure & Azure Functions
A firm commitment to quality code
Responsibilities: Report directly to the CTO
Communicate – understand when it’s a technical decision vs. a product decision and socialize uncertainties
Pay attention to detail and refactor as you go
Meet with the development team to discuss user interface ideas and applications
Review application requirements and interface designs
Refine the CI/CD pipeline and Cloud Ops processes

job_description:
Requirements:

- Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer, with a strong emphasis on React.js.

- Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and experience with front-end libraries and frameworks.

- Experience in building responsive and visually appealing UI/UX designs.

- Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous programming.

- Strong understanding of version control systems such as Git.

- Solid knowledge of software engineering principles and development best practices.

- Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a remote team environment.

- Excellent communication skills in English, both written and verbal.

- Past work/portfolio demonstrating your skills in developing front-end and admin interfaces with React.

Nice to Have:

- Experience with back-end technologies such as Node.js, Express, and databases (e.g., MongoDB, SQL).

- Knowledge of state management libraries like Redux or MobX.

- Familiarity with UI/UX design tools like Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD.

Qualifications: Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer, with a strong emphasis on React.js
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and experience with front-end libraries and frameworks
Experience in building responsive and visually appealing UI/UX designs
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous programming

Solid knowledge of software engineering principles and development best practices
Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a remote team environment
Excellent communication skills in English, both written and verbal

job_title: JavaScript/React Developer - Events Ticketing - Hybrid Alpharetta GA
job_description:
An company located in Alpharetta, Georgia is looking for a Senior frontend JavaScript developer to join the team responsible for their flagship application that provides ticketing services for small-sized sports events hosted across the US.

Candidates should have extensive knowledge of frontend JavaScript/React development and have some exposure to a Java Backend. You will operate in an Agile environment, responsible for a mix of front end (User Interface), as well as some back-end development (API). This position will interact with the business, DevOps, QA and leadership teams on web-application development. This role will be hybrid and any applicants will be expected onsite up to twice a week in Alpharetta.

Required Skills & Experience
• JavaScript
• React
• Java
• RESTful APIs
Desired Skills & Experience
• AWS hosting
• Docker deployments
• ECS
What You Will Be Doing

Tech Breakdown
• 100% JavaScript Development

Daily Responsibilities
• 75% Hands On
• 25% Team Collaboration
The Offer
• Competitive Salary
• Bonus eligible

You Will Receive The Following Benefits
• Medical Insurance
• Dental Benefits
• Vision Benefits
• Paid Time Off (PTO)
• 401(k) {including match}

Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the US on a full-time basis now and in the future.

Posted By: Brian Goehrig

Qualifications: Candidates should have extensive knowledge of frontend JavaScript/React development and have some exposure to a Java Backend
RESTful APIs
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the US on a full-time basis now and in the future
Responsibilities: You will operate in an Agile environment, responsible for a mix of front end (User Interface), as well as some back-end development (API)
This position will interact with the business, DevOps, QA and leadership teams on web-application development
This role will be hybrid and any applicants will be expected onsite up to twice a week in Alpharetta

job_description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Frontend Developer with a solid 4-5 years of professional experience in React, SQL, and API development to join our frontend development team. As a Senior Frontend Developer at Signimus Technologies, you will be instrumental in crafting user-friendly interfaces, optimizing application performance, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate closely with product managers, designers, and backend developers to understand project requirements and design elegant solutions.

Develop responsive, high-quality, and modular frontend components using React and associated libraries.

Integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.

Design and optimize SQL database schemas, queries, and transactions for efficient data retrieval and manipulation.

Build and maintain RESTful APIs, ensuring security, scalability, and reliability.

Implement state management using Redux, Mobx, or similar technologies.

Write unit tests and perform end-to-end testing to ensure code quality and functionality.

Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback to maintain codebase quality.

Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues, optimizing application performance.

Stay up-to-date with the latest frontend trends, technologies, and best practices.

Responsibilities: Collaborate closely with product managers, designers, and backend developers to understand project requirements and design elegant solutions
Develop responsive, high-quality, and modular frontend components using React and associated libraries
Integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic, ensuring high performance and responsiveness
Design and optimize SQL database schemas, queries, and transactions for efficient data retrieval and manipulation
Build and maintain RESTful APIs, ensuring security, scalability, and reliability
Implement state management using Redux, Mobx, or similar technologies
Write unit tests and perform end-to-end testing to ensure code quality and functionality
Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback to maintain codebase quality
Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues, optimizing application performance

job_title: Need a frontend developer to enhance my website features(preferrable react developer).
job_description: I am having an existing website running, but am not sure of the features it contains. Therefore, need of a developer who could add different features related to my category.

Randstad Technologies is the worlds largest workforce solutions company and we have an immediate need with a client of ours in the Saas Industry.
They are in need of a Frontend React Developer This is a very exciting opportunity and will be a great React Developer, Frontend, Developer, Staffing, Technology

We are seeking a skilled React Developer with experience in integrating and working with KRpano to join our dynamic development team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in React development and a proven track record of creating immersive 360-degree experiences using KRpano. You will play a key role in developing interactive virtual tours and panoramas for our clients, enhancing user experiences and pushing the boundaries of web-based visualization.

Responsibilities:

Develop and maintain interactive web applications using React.js.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and backend developers to deliver high-quality software solutions.

Integrate KRpano into React applications to create engaging 360-degree experiences and virtual tours.

Customize and enhance KRpano functionalities to meet specific project requirements.

Ensure responsive design and optimal performance of the web applications across various devices and browsers.

Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in React development and 360-degree media technologies.

Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).

Strong proficiency in React.js and its core principles.

Demonstrated experience in integrating and working with KRpano to create interactive 360-degree experiences.

Solid understanding of web technologies including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Familiarity with state management libraries such as Redux or Mobx.

Experience with version control systems, preferably Git.

Ability to write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.

Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

Preferred Additional Skills:

Familiarity with other 360-degree media frameworks or libraries.

Experience with WebGL and 3D graphics programming.

Knowledge of backend technologies and APIs.

Previous work on virtual tours, augmented reality (AR), or virtual reality (VR) projects.

Qualifications: The ideal candidate will have a strong background in React development and a proven track record of creating immersive 360-degree experiences using KRpano
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience)
Strong proficiency in React.js and its core principles
Demonstrated experience in integrating and working with KRpano to create interactive 360-degree experiences

Experience with version control systems, preferably Git
